title: South Korea Households Debt To GDP
description: Households Debt in South Korea decreased to 105.40 percent of GDP in the first quarter of 2022 from 105.80 percent of GDP in the fourth quarter of 2021. Households Debt to GDP in South Korea averaged 42.76 percent of GDP from 1962 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 106.70 percent of GDP in the third quarter of 2021 and a record low of 1.40 percent of GDP in the fourth quarter of 1964. This page provides - South Korea Households Debt To Gdp- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank for International Settlements
